content: This game is hilarious and really fun. There's a lot of really great dialogue that made me laugh out loud. The gameplay is really good too, it's relatively easy to progress and I like the metrics of collecting new believers and then catering your cult to specific groups. As someone who has played a lot of "tycoon" style games this is easily one of my favorites
replyContent: Thank you! üòä

content: Love it, the longer you play the easier the rewards get which I like. Silly, funny, lighthearted and addictive. Would be great if there was an option to save your game mid-round too. Ive had trouble with the game 'freezing' a few times, but simply force quit and reopened to work again (I'm on Samsung 9, may be my phone?), understandable for a new game though.
replyContent: A review like that is really heart warming. Thank you. - as to mid-round saves, it might be possible after Passage selections. I'll have to look into it. Thanks for the idea. But I'm disturbed to hear that you've had game freezes. If you read this, and are so inclined, more info on when they happen (to the email under Developer) would be great.

content: It is a very funny game, I like how it doesn't take itself seriously and there are a lot of funny dialogues and revelation passages. I chuckled a lot when playing this game. For a tycoon game, it has a very nice progression of recruiting, researching and slowing building up your cult. Graphics is nice and definitely fits the theme. There are multiple offices and many different character models. If I have to find something to improve, it would probably be the UI. the buttons are a bit small üòÖ
replyContent: Thanks for the very nice and detailed review (and for the 5 üåü!) We'll have a look at what we can do about enlarging UI elements.
